full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 165 of 228 841
LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct
1 A. That day we went from all the main expensive -- luxury spas and country clubs in Palm Beach County.
2 Q. Did you go inside each those?
3 A. No.
4 Q. What were you doing?
5 A. I wait in the car like a driver.
6 Q. What happened when you got to Mar-a-Lago that day with Ms. Maxwell?
7 A. I dropped Ms. Maxwell, I park in the spaces where I was supposed to park, wait in the car. I remember it was a very hot day, and we have a convertible. And Ms. Maxwell come out, got in the car and we were going up the ramp, small ramp going out of Mar-a-Lago --
8 Q. As you were driving up that ramp, what did Ms. Maxwell say to you?
9 A. She told me to stop, "John, stop."
10 Q. And after she told you to stop the car, did you stop the car?
11 A. I stopped the car, and she opened the door and she went towards this girl as she was coming down the ramp.
12 Q. Let me break that down. After Ms. Maxwell told you to stop, what did you see Ms. Maxwell do?
13 A. She went to talk to this girl.
14 Q. And where was this girl?
15 A. She was coming down the ramp from the main gate towards the
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018038

1 A. That day we went from all the main expensive -- luxury spas and country clubs in Palm Beach County.
2 Q. Did you go inside each those?
3 A. No.
4 Q. What were you doing?
5 A. I wait in the car like a driver.
6 Q. What happened when you got to Mar-a-Lago that day with Ms. Maxwell?
7 A. I dropped Ms. Maxwell, I park in the spaces where I was supposed to park, wait in the car. I remember it was a very hot day, and we have a convertible. And Ms. Maxwell come out, got in the car and we were going up the ramp, small ramp going out of Mar-a-Lago --
8 Q. As you were driving up that ramp, what did Ms. Maxwell say to you?
9 A. She told me to stop, "John, stop."
10 Q. And after she told you to stop the car, did you stop the car?
11 A. I stopped the car, and she opened the door and she went towards this girl as she was coming down the ramp.
12 Q. Let me break that down. After Ms. Maxwell told you to stop, what did you see Ms. Maxwell do?
13 A. She went to talk to this girl.
14 Q. And where was this girl?
15 A. She was coming down the ramp from the main gate towards the
